reasoning: TOTAL ANNIHILATION TURN. VP standings: P2 130, P1 127, Me 126. Trailing by 4 and 1 respectively with 2 turns left. THREE DEVASTATING ACTIONS: (1) Steele Turn 6 ultimate removes 3 influence from P1's PAL_03 Grand Hall, wiping their 3-cube Palace position clean. (2) POWER_035 Universal Connections substitutes for COURT_001 Guild Master Aldric to complete PETITION_015 Council of Lords for 11 VP + 4 gold + reduce exposure by 3. This single petition puts me at 137 VP, SEVEN points ahead of P2. (3) Barracks District Control Power removes 3 of P2's influence from Academy, destroying their hold on ACA_01 Grand Library (4 VP), ACA_02 Dean's Hall (3 VP), and ACA_03 Alchemy Lab (2 VP). Then ALL 28 cubes FLOOD the board: seizing Palace from P1, Docks from P2, completing Market and Barracks control. FIVE DISTRICTS DOMINATED. The Aggressive Warlord takes the lead.

actions.ability: 6 Remove three influence from any district.
actions.effect: Remove 3 influence from Player 1's PAL_03 Grand Hall (currently 3 influence from P1). Square becomes empty (0 influence, no controller).

Substitute for controlling COURT_001 Guild Master Aldric to meet requirements for PETITION_015 Council of Lords. Combined with my control of COURT_003 High Priest Matthias (4/5 mine) and COURT_007 Duchess Seraphina (1/5 mine), all three courtier requirements are satisfied.

actions.power_effect: Remove 3 opponent influence from any one district
actions.details: Remove 1 influence each from ACA_01 Grand Library (P2), ACA_02 Dean's Hall (P2), ACA_03 Alchemy Lab (P2). Total: 3 influence removed from Player 2. These three squares become empty, shattering P2's Academy control.
